Favipiravir was also reported to have antiviral effect on Lassa fever virus, providing 100% protection in the lethal NHP model of Lassa fever.
76 It could be an alternative to ribavirin, the only recommended drug against Lassa, or be used in combination to it. Indeed. several in vitro studies and mice studies showed that ribavirin may potentiate the efficacy of favipiravir against various RNA viruses,
9 ,
77 which prompted its use to treat several patients with severe Lassa fever virus infection.
